subtitles.text: I'm at Cafe Gratitude a Legendary

what's happening is medical medium
dishes are going to be on the menu here
they are right here Drew just dressed
them up this is an incredible thing

think people are really going to love
this because this is incredible healing

in these dishes these are clean as clean

here that's incredible that's how

this is an incredibly inspiring
collaboration I'm really really excited

hey aw give me a couple of dish is
